name: Paul A. Jenkins
content: Professor Paul Jenkins Skip to main content Skip to navigation I am a Professor in the Depts of Statistics and Computer Science, with interests in Monte Carlo methods, inference from stochastic processes, mathematical population genetics, machine learning. I am a member of the Warwick Machine Learning group.TeachingST341 Statistical GeneticsST418 Statistical Genetics with Advanced TopicsST407 Monte Carlo MethodsI am currently supervising undergraduate and Masters projects via our project modules CS350, ST415, ST421, and ST955. I do not participate in URSS. Sorry I am currently unable to take on any undergraduate projects or internships from applications outside Warwick.PreprintsSant, J., Jenkins, P.
